SELECT CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, IFNULL( l.mall, "" ), IFNULL( l.NAME, "" ) ) AS local_desc, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code, a.id AS activityId, a.name AS activityName, date_format( ap.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( ap.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, CASE WHEN ap.end_time >=#{endTime} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END state FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apm.activity_plan_id AND ap.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN inno72_activity a ON a.id = ap.activity_id and a.is_delete = 0 WHERE m.machine_status = '4'
AND m.machine_id = machineId
AND (l.mall LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or JSON_EXTRACT(l.tag, '$.tags') LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.province LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.city LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.district LIKE '%${keyword}%' )

SELECT CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, IFNULL( l.mall, "" ), IFNULL( l.NAME, "" ) ) AS local_desc, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code, t.id AS activityId, t.name AS activityName, date_format( mt.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( mt.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, CASE WHEN mm.max_time >=#{endTime} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END state FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON mt.interact_machine_id = im.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact t ON t.id = im.interact_id and t.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT machine_id,MAX(mt.end_time) AS max_time FROM inno72_interact_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON m.id=mt.interact_machine_id GROUP BY m.machine_id ) mm on m.id=mm.machine_id WHERE m.machine_status = '4'
AND (l.mall LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or JSON_EXTRACT(l.tag, '$.tags') LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.province LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.city LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.district LIKE '%${keyword}%' )

FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON mt.interact_machine_id = im.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact t ON t.id = im.interact_id and t.is_delete = 0 WHERE m.machine_status = '4'
AND m.machine_id = machineId
AND im.interact_id = interactId

AND (l.mall LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or JSON_EXTRACT(l.tag, '$.tags') LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.province LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.city LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.district LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' )
